name: The Pootis Tracks
description:
This is my first unity game/project ever. I'm def a newbie but I have a passion to create things. Recently I've had a love for making music and I want to study how to make animations/games. 

There is no specific gameplay loop but there is a Jukebox inside the bar. I'm using this project to develop some amateur skills with unity and give myself a platform to showcase my music. Walk up to the jukebox to see buttons that play my songs.

I want to build an audience for my creations. Eventually I want to make games/animations that follow my childhood and I really want people to know my story. 

Click to start(Unity kept playing the animation first and the audio on click so i needed a blank-ish frame)

WASD to move

Press E on the spinning sprite to change map 

H to hump(or dance)
